EmailTemplate.name: Decoding Retail - eBook Phase.Send Email 2.Subject Line Test
EmailTemplate.subject: New: 5-Point Transformation Map for {{company.Company Name:default=Your Store}}
EmailTemplate.textOnly: What was in your store transformation strategy back in the beginning of the year?How does it look now?If you’re like most grocery store retailers, priorities have changed. Investments got reshuffled. Because shoppers just don’t behave like they used to. And it’s powering new transformation strategies from the inside out.Get the jump on these trends with our latest research. We’ll show you what to know and what to do—plus all-new statistics, practical recommendations and guidance mapped to today’s environment. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]>
